derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French épiscopal or ecclesiastical Latin episcopalis, from episcopus 'bishop', from Greek episkopos 'overseer' (see bishop)

entry.tran: （苏格兰和美国的）新教圣公会的
entry.def: Episcopal means relating to a branch of the Anglican Church in Scotland and the USA.

means.word_mean: 1. denoting or governed by or relating to a bishop or bishops
